'''''...That Will Pierce the Heavens!''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete all 3 [[Warrior's Challenge]]s in the [[Basin of Unnumbered Flames]] and [[Tequemecan Valley]] with a grade of SS.

==Gameplay Notes==
* The challenges can be started by talking to [[Centaca]] and [[Quiltec]] in [[Tequemecan Valley]], and [[Xiuhyo]] in [[Basin of Unnumbered Flames]].

==Trivia==
* The name of this achievement is a reference to the anime ''{{w|Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann}}''.
